entry.title: Ukraine Shifts to War Footing, Proclaiming State of Emergency
entry.content: Ukraine begins to mobilize reservists, calling on its citizens to leave Russia immediately because of a Russian offensive as soon as Wednesday night.

entry.title: Ukraine Crisis Kicks Off New Superpower Struggle Among U.S., Russia and China
entry.content: Beijing and Moscow now hold a stronger hand in confronting the West than during the Cold War.

entry.title: Indian School's Ban on Hijabs Ignites Battle Over Religious Rights
entry.content: Five students are challenging a ban against wearing Islamic headscarves at their government-run school, inflaming a fractious national debate over religion and minority rights in India and sparking confrontations outside campus gates.
